title: Saint Croix National Scenic Riverway: Featured Programs
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Featured Programs              Featured Programs        Get connected to the river through an engaging program. NPS/VanTatenhove       Highlights of specific current and upcoming programs are listed here. Check the calendar for additional details and the park's full program schedule.      Stillwater Islands Pontoon Programs Explore the natural history of the Stillwater Islands area of the St. Croix River with a park ranger-led pontoon tour. Call 715-483-2275 to reserve a seat on the boat, open to adults and children 13 and over. Programs begin on July 7th and are offered weekly throughout the summer on Monday and Thursday evenings.      Vets on the River Programs  Enjoy the beauty and recreation that the St. Croix and Namekagon rivers have to offer in these exclusive programs for veterans and student veterans.      Sunday Morning Coffee Walks   Join a park ranger for some fresh coffee, good conversation, and a healthy morning walk near the St. Croix River starting on June 12th. See the handy schedule to join us on one walk or plan to join us for the summer!      Active Trails Programs Get out there and get moving! These programs promote healthy lifestyles while enjoying the Riverway. Use the program listing to find the right activity for you.
